title: makime
author: makime
content: BINANCE LEAVES CANADA: The REAL reason revealed! Do zk-SNARKs really prove its assets?In this thrilling video, DomiGeek and Gontran tackle a question that's shaking the crypto universe: Why is Binance leaving Canada?They delve into the true reason behind this departure and discuss the political and financial implications for the platform's users. Far from limiting themselves to the hot news, they also question the security of cryptocurrency exchanges and the validity of the insurances that traditional banks have compared to cryptocurrency platforms.The discussion heats up around the subject of ZK-SNARKs, a Zero-Knowledge proof protocol. Does this protocol actually prove Binance's assets? Gontran and DomiGeek lift the veil on this complex and fascinating topic.This video is in French but you can activate subtitle in english....https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=QVT-_Swehk8
